Package com.example.scanpal

Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
com.example.scanpal.Controllers.ImageController
public class ImageController extends Object
Controller class for managing image uploads and retrievals with Firebase Storage.

      public void uploadImage(android.net.Uri fileUri, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<com.google.firebase.storage.UploadTask.TaskSnapshot> onSuccessListener, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener onFailureListener)

      Parameters:
      fileUri - The URI of the file to be uploaded.
      onSuccessListener - Listener for successful upload operations.
      onFailureListener - Listener for failed upload operations.

    • fetchImage

      public void fetchImage(String fileName, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<android.net.Uri> onSuccessListener, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener onFailureListener)
      Fetches the download URL of an image stored in Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file in storage.
      onSuccessListener - Listener for successful retrieval operations.
      onFailureListener - Listener for failed retrieval operations.
